desc_content.paragraph: Align selected bones to the active bone (or to their parent)
Change the visible armature layers

field_body.paragraph: layers (boolean array of 32 items, (optional)) – Layer, Armature layers to make visible

desc_content.paragraph: Automatically renames the selected bones according to which side of the target axis they fall on

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['XAXIS', 'YAXIS', 'ZAXIS'], (optional)) – Axis, Axis tag names withXAXIS X-Axis, Left/Right.YAXIS Y-Axis, Front/Back.ZAXIS Z-Axis, Top/Bottom.

desc_content.paragraph: Change the layers that the selected bones belong to

field_body.paragraph: layers (boolean array of 32 items, (optional)) – Layer, Armature layers that bone belongs to

desc_content.paragraph: Add a new bone located at the 3D-Cursor

field_body.paragraph: name (string, (optional, never None)) – Name, Name of the newly created bone

desc_content.paragraph: Automatically fix alignment of select bones’ axes

list_item.paragraph: axis_flip (boolean, (optional)) – Flip Axis, Negate the alignment axis
axis_only (boolean, (optional)) – Shortest Rotation, Ignore the axis direction, use the shortest rotation to align

desc_content.paragraph: Create a new bone going from the last selected joint to the mouse position
Remove selected bones from the armature
Dissolve selected bones from the armature
Make copies of the selected bones within the same armature

field_body.paragraph: do_flip_names (boolean, (optional)) – Flip Names, Try to flip names of the bones, if possible, instead of adding a number extension

desc_content.paragraph: Make copies of the selected bones within the same armature and move them

list_item.paragraph: ARMATURE_OT_duplicate (ARMATURE_OT_duplicate, (optional)) – Duplicate Selected Bone(s), Make copies of the selected bones within the same armature

desc_content.paragraph: Create new bones from the selected joints
Create new bones from the selected joints and move them

list_item.paragraph: ARMATURE_OT_extrude (ARMATURE_OT_extrude, (optional)) – Extrude, Create new bones from the selected joints

desc_content.paragraph: Create new bones from the selected joints and move them

list_item.paragraph: ARMATURE_OT_extrude (ARMATURE_OT_extrude, (optional)) – Extrude, Create new bones from the selected joints

desc_content.paragraph: Add bone between selected joint(s) and/or 3D-Cursor
Flips (and corrects) the axis suffixes of the names of selected bones

field_body.paragraph: do_strip_numbers (boolean, (optional)) – Strip Numbers, Try to remove right-most dot-number from flipped names (WARNING: may result in incoherent naming in some cases)

desc_content.paragraph: Tag selected bones to not be visible in Edit Mode

field_body.paragraph: unselected (boolean, (optional)) – Unselected, Hide unselected rather than selected

desc_content.paragraph: Make all armature layers visible

field_body.paragraph: all (boolean, (optional)) – All Layers, Enable all layers or just the first 16 (top row)

desc_content.paragraph: Merge continuous chains of selected bones
Remove the parent-child relationship between selected bones and their parents

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['CLEAR', 'DISCONNECT'], (optional)) – ClearType, What way to clear parenting

desc_content.paragraph: Set the active bone as the parent of the selected bones

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['CONNECTED', 'OFFSET'], (optional)) – ParentType, Type of parenting

desc_content.paragraph: Reveal all bones hidden in Edit Mode
Clear roll for selected bones
Toggle selection status of all bones

field_body.paragraph: action (enum in ['TOGGLE', 'SELECT', 'DESELECT', 'INVERT'], (optional)) – Action, Selection action to executeTOGGLE Toggle, Toggle selection for all elements.SELECT Select, Select all elements.DESELECT Deselect, Deselect all elements.INVERT Invert, Invert selection of all elements.

desc_content.paragraph: Select immediate parent/children of selected bones
Deselect those bones at the boundary of each selection region
Select bones related to selected ones by parent/child relationships
Mirror the bone selection

list_item.paragraph: only_active (boolean, (optional)) – Active Only, Only operate on the active bone

desc_content.paragraph: Select those bones connected to the initial selection
Select similar bones by property types
Isolate selected bones into a separate armature
Select shortest path between two bones
Split off selected bones from connected unselected bones
Break selected bones into chains of smaller bones
Change the direction that a chain of bones points in (head <-> tail swap)
Enforce symmetry, make copies of the selection or use existing

field_body.paragraph: direction (enum in ['NEGATIVE_X', 'POSITIVE_X'], (optional)) – Direction, Which sides to copy from and to (when both are selected)
